title: No idea how this happened

embed.description: No goddamn clue what did this.

body:
So yeah, gist of the situation was that in a ranked game the enemy top TP flanked us - causing the ADC to die and me basically to blow some summoners to get the hell out of dodge. Our jungler comes and cleans up the fight and somehow I got the kill when backing on Soraka (so its not like I had a passive dot)?

Bloody weird.

replies.body:
Shyvanro hadn't touched the Lulu, she died to minions, and you touched her recently enough to get the kill :)

It really looks like the Shyv W should have touched her but I imagine it's a combo of being right on the edge of it between it's ticks and the camera angle in bot lane.
Yeah, it really looks like she was in the AoE from Shyv so thats why I was surprised. Fair enough, minions op.
Rito pls nerf minions op op
